<Meta title="Templates/Actions/Default Toolbar Action" />

# Default Toolbar Action

```jsx
const DefaultToolbarAction = (props) => {

	const {action, selected, onSuccess, onError} = props;

	useEffect(() => {
		if (action.onClick) {
			new Promise((resolve) => resolve(action))
				.then(action => action.onClick(selected))
				.then(onSuccess).catch(onError);

			return;
		}

		const method = detectActionMethod(action);
		const payload = Array.isArray(selected) ? selected.map(s => s.id) : [selected.id];

		action.href && submitRequest(action.href, payload, method).then(onSuccess).catch(onError);
	}, []);

	return null;
};
```
